data.prayer: Please, teach the 1,289 believers in Adilabad, Telangana, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Adilabad, Telangana, India

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,289 believers in the county of Adilabad with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.section_summary: On average, 24 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Adilabad, Telangana, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Adilabad, Telangana, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,289 believers in Adilabad to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Byagara people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, make the church in Adilabad, Telangana, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 117,200 people living in Adilabad through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Adilabad against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

location.name: Adilabad
location.people_groups_list: Gosangi (Hindu traditions), Mala Jangam, Padigarajulu, Mawalud, Velama Koppala
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gosangi (Hindu traditions) (31,000), Mala Jangam (12,000), Padigarajulu (1,000), Mawalud (219,000), Velama Koppala (21,000)
